text: Nicholas Scott "Nick" Lachey ( ; born November 9, 1973) is an American singer- songwriter, actor, producer, and television personality. He was best known as the lead singer of the multi-platinum selling boy band 98 Degrees. Lachey was born in Harlan, Kentucky and was raised in Cincinnati, Ohio. He was married to singer Jessica Simpson from 2002 to 2006. He married model Vanessa Minnillo in 2011. Their son, Camden John Lachey, was born on September 12, 2012. Lachey and his wife are hosts of the 2020 Netflix reality dating series, Love Is Blind. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 births Category:Actors from Cincinnati Category:Actors from Kentucky Category:American Christians Category:American movie actors Category:American pop musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American television actors Category:American record producers Category:Singers from Kentucky Category:Singers from Cincinnati Category:Television personalities from Kentucky Category:Television personalities from Ohio Category:American tenors Category:Living people Category:Writers from Cincinnati
title: Nick Lachey
